property.name: chukwaAgent.control.port
property.description: The socket port number the agent's control interface can be contacted at.

property.name: chukwaAgent.hostname
property.description: The hostname of the agent on this node. Usually localhost, this is used by the chukwa instrumentation agent-control interface library

property.name: chukwaAgent.checkpoint.name
property.description: the prefix to to prepend to the agent's checkpoint file(s)

property.name: chukwaAgent.checkpoint.dir
property.description: the location to put the agent's checkpoint file(s)

property.name: chukwaAgent.checkpoint.interval
property.description: the frequency interval for the agent to do checkpoints, in milliseconds
